revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lake Acuity |image = [[File:Lake Acuity.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Lake Acuity. |tokens = 78,000 |location = North of Route 217, west of Snowpoint City. }} '''Lake Acuity''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,261,800 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck || colspan=2 rowspan=9| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel |- | [[File:Snorunt.png|40px]] Snorunt |- | [[File:Bibarel.png|40px]] Bibarel |- | [[File:Snover.png|40px]] Snover |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Uxie.png|40px]] '''Uxie*''' || <center>10,070,000 || [[File:Commander_(jupiter).png|40px]] Commander Jupiter || {{Pokemon|Golbat}}, {{Pokemon|Bronzor}}, {{Pokemon|Skuntank}} || <center>1,690,000 |} '''*Must have cleared Distortion World at least once to unlock Uxie.'''
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 2 || 50.49% || 48.88% || 42.13% |- | {{Bag2|Sitrus}} || N/A || 25.24% || 24.44% || 21.06% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 2 || 50.05% || 50.05% || 50.05% |- | {{Bag2|Sitrus}} || N/A || 25.03% || 25.03% || 25.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |} </tab> </tabs>
